Koo::Dialogs::FullTextSearchDialog::FullTextSearchDialog

Koo::Dialogs::FullTextSearchDialog::FullTextSearchDialog Class Reference

The FullTextSearchDialog class shows a dialog for searching text at all indexed models. More...

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The FullTextSearchDialog class shows a dialog for searching text at all indexed models.

The dialog has a text box for the user input and a combo box to search at one specific model or all models that have at least one field indexed.
